short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks .html files and websites, meant for a school enviroment with rampant gaming

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Made this on a whim to keep students trying to play .html games in school environment on track
10/15/24
*Added popup window when clicking the extension, as well as updating the redirected site*
10/22/24
*Fixed it so it also redirects websites as well as local files*
11/6/24
*Revamped the whole thing, gave it a much simpler approach as well as added an admin menu and a hardcoded whitelist with the ability to manually add urls to temporarily unblock a site*
